dnd_text:
Drag and drop a folder here
or click the 'Browse Folder' button
gdrive_wip: Google Drive functionality is currently a work in progress.
api_key_tooltip:
Please set your own Gemini API key.
AI features cannot be used if this is empty.
It will be saved automatically when the app is closed.
prompt_tooltip:
Enter your instructions for the AI here.
The text {keywords} will be automatically replaced with keywords extracted from the image.
status_ready: Ready. Drop a folder or set your API key from the File menu.
status_error_loading_files: An error occurred while getting the file list.
status_suggesting_names: AI is suggesting names for {count} files...
msgbox_warn_select_files_msg: Please select files for AI suggestions.
msgbox_warn_no_api_key_msg: API key has not been entered.
msgbox_confirm_rename_msg: Are you sure you want to rename {count} files?
msgbox_info_about_msg:
TagCleric AI File Renamer v{version}

This software is provided under the terms of the license agreement (EULA.txt).

If you find this tool helpful, we would appreciate your support through a donation.
It will motivate future development!

Development Support: Google Gemini
about_api_key_link_text: * How to get a Gemini API key *
api_key_instructions_message: To use TagCleric's AI features, you need an API key generated from Google AI Studio. Follow the steps below to get a key and paste it into the input field.
api_key_step1: 1. Click the 'Open API Key Page' button below to go to Google AI Studio.
api_key_step2: 2. Click the 'Create API key in new project' button to generate a new API key.
api_key_step4: 4. Paste the copied key into the input field below and click 'Save and Start'.
lang_change_manual_restart_message: Language settings have been saved. Please restart the application to apply the changes.
quota_error_message:
Processing stopped because you have reached the free tier limit for the model '{model_name}'.

Please try again later or consider upgrading to a paid plan in Google AI Studio.
